name: spaces-cli-dev
description: Development setup for the Spaces CLI project

onboarding.title: Welcome to Spaces CLI Development
onboarding.description:
This onboarding will help you set up your development environment.

You'll need:
- Bun runtime installed
- GitHub CLI (gh) authenticated

Let's verify your setup!

onboarding.title: Bun Runtime
onboarding.description: Bun is required to run and build the CLI.

onboarding.title: GitHub CLI
onboarding.description: The GitHub CLI is used for repository operations. Make sure you're logged in with 'gh auth login'.

onboarding.title: Your Name
onboarding.description: Enter your name for the development environment (used in example scripts).

onboarding.title: You're All Set!
onboarding.description:
Your development environment is configured.

Next steps:
1. Run 'bun install' to install dependencies
2. Run 'bun run dev' to start the CLI in dev mode
3. Run 'bun run typecheck' to check types

Happy coding!
